Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for ReloadConfiguration

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  * toggleMute - This will toggle MicMute in meeting apps like Teams and Zoom

Binds hotkeys for ReloadConfiguration

Parameters:

  • mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  • toggleMute - This will toggle MicMute in meeting apps like Teams and Zoom

parameters:

   * toggleMute - This will toggle MicMute in meeting apps like Teams and Zoom

desc: This is a helper module for the JC Pro Macro 2 Pad. It needs appropiate code on the board!
desc_gfm: This is a helper module for the JC Pro Macro 2 Pad. It needs appropiate code on the board!
doc:
This is a helper module for the JC Pro Macro 2 Pad. It needs appropiate code on the board!
It provides some useful functions and controls the LEDs on the board (not yet).

Things like mute and raiseHand support common meeting apps I use. If you need another one,
feel free to add the keyStrokes to the lists.
doc_gfm:
This is a helper module for the JC Pro Macro 2 Pad. It needs appropiate code on the board! It provides some useful functions and controls the LEDs on the board (not yet).

Things like mute and raiseHand support common meeting apps I use. If you need another one, feel free to add the keyStrokes to the lists.
